title: Structural Causal Models
scope: Formal causal graphs, structural equations, and assumptions that define intervention semantics.
query: ti:"structural causal" OR abs:"structural causal" OR ti:"structural equation" OR abs:"structural equation"

title: Identifiability & Do-Calculus
scope: Conditions and proofs that justify causal identification from observational or interventional data.
query: ti:identifiability OR abs:identifiability OR ti:"do-calculus" OR abs:"do-calculus"

title: Counterfactual Reasoning
scope: Counterfactual queries, potential outcomes, and intervention-specific explanations.
query: ti:counterfactual OR abs:counterfactual OR ti:"potential outcomes"

title: Causal Discovery
scope: Learning causal graphs from observational or interventional data, with explicit identifiability assumptions.
query: ti:"causal discovery" OR abs:"causal discovery" OR ti:"structure learning" OR abs:"structure learning"

title: Latent Confounding Discovery
scope: Discovery with hidden variables, partial observability, and weak supervision.
query: ti:confounding OR abs:confounding OR ti:latent OR abs:latent

title: Causal Effect Estimation
scope: Estimating ATE/CATE and counterfactuals under explicit assumptions.
query: ti:"treatment effect" OR abs:"treatment effect" OR ti:counterfactual OR abs:counterfactual

title: Instrumental Variables
scope: Identification under unobserved confounding using valid instruments and sensitivity checks.
query: ti:"instrumental variable" OR abs:"instrumental variable"

title: Mediation & Path Effects
scope: Decomposing causal pathways and reasoning about mediated effects.
query: ti:mediation OR abs:mediation OR ti:"path-specific" OR abs:"path-specific"

title: Causal Representation Learning
scope: Learning representations that encode causal structure or disentangled factors.
query: ti:"causal representation" OR abs:"causal representation"

title: Causal Generative Models
scope: Generative models with intervention-aware constraints and counterfactual sampling.
query: ti:"causal generative" OR abs:"causal generative" OR ti:"counterfactual generation"

title: Causal World Models
scope: World models that encode causal structure for planning and intervention reasoning.
query: ti:"world model" OR abs:"world model" AND ti:causal

title: Causal Time Series & Spatiotemporal
scope: Temporal and spatiotemporal causal inference with interventions and shifts.
query: ti:"causal time series" OR abs:"causal time series" OR abs:spatiotemporal

title: Causal Reinforcement Learning
scope: Causal reasoning in sequential decision-making and policy evaluation.
query: ti:"causal reinforcement" OR abs:"causal reinforcement" OR abs:"causal rl"

title: Off-Policy Evaluation
scope: Estimating policy effects from logged data and partial interventions.
query: ti:"off-policy" OR abs:"off-policy" OR ti:"off policy"

title: Causal Reasoning in LLMs
scope: Causal prompts, counterfactual reasoning, and evaluation for large language models.
query: ti:causal AND (ti:LLM OR abs:LLM OR abs:"language model")

title: Causal Agents
scope: Agentic systems that plan interventions or tool use with causal models.
query: ti:causal AND (ti:agent OR abs:agent) AND (abs:intervention OR abs:planning)

title: Distribution Shift & Invariance
scope: Leveraging environment changes to find stable causal structure and predictors.
query: ti:invariant OR abs:invariant OR ti:"distribution shift" OR abs:"distribution shift" OR ti:"domain generalization"

title: Causal Fairness
scope: Causal definitions of fairness in high-stakes decisions.
query: ti:"causal fairness" OR abs:"causal fairness" OR ti:fairness OR abs:fairness

title: Causal Privacy & Data Minimization
scope: Causal inference under privacy constraints, data minimization, and disclosure risk.
query: ti:privacy AND (ti:causal OR abs:causal)

title: Systems & Tooling
scope: Libraries and tooling for practical causal pipelines.
query: ti:"causal inference" AND (ti:library OR ti:toolkit OR abs:library OR abs:toolkit)
